DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, end your turn and reduce #ySleep by #b1. NL Whenever you are attacked, reduce #ySleep by #b1.
At the start of its turn or when it takes unblocked damage, increase #yBleed by #b1. When it obtains #b10 #yBleed, it loses 33% of max HP and remove #yBleed.
The enemy receives 10% more damage for each card played this turn.
Orb: Apply Poison to ALL enemies at the end of your turn and when evoked.
